title: Someone got into my account and played a game and left?
body: So last night i got off after getting to 99lp (pissed) then an hr later my friend msged why did you get on and then leave a game? I was like what i didnt get on so i realised someone has gotten into my account and fucking played a ranked game and basically thats all. i changed my password and everything but rito pls help me find this guy.

replies.body: It's super important to have[ good computer safety practices ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)not just for league, but any account you have anywhere.  I suggest going over our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to make sure that you've secured your account.  If you still need any help with recovery, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Props to your friend for letting you know!
